submission_title: Report reveals Indigenous employment at U of T increased — marginally
author: the-varsity

submission_title: Report reveals Indigenous employment at U of T increased — marginally
author: HiphenNA
body: Well yeah. Even in ontario they're an incredibly small minority being broken into smaller communities and be it either being hired for research, teaching, etc, theres not much interest from regular undergrads unless they're taking a course out of interest. I took an intro to inukitut language course which was fun and there was only 5 of us.
